text: High school with loving caring skillful teachers and cosy comfy welcoming ambience for students with spacious garden and greeneries. Affiliation with St Andrew's JC! Government-aided co-educational missionary secondary school opp Yio Chu Kang MRT station. Friendly caring professional study ambience for future leaders.

My child graduated, always hear her talking about how she and her friends suffer in Guzheng cca. The conductor (conductor Lim) being rude towards the students, attacking them using words… Despite the fact that there are many complains from parents, the school did not take any actions towards the conductor which was very disappointing… This conductor has affected many students’ mental health, causing them to be low self-esteem.

Mr Chang Wai San threw a bag at a secondary 1 female student in 2014. He is still a teacher there. When the student complained to a teacher about it, they made the students sitting nearby write a reflection about what happened and then put it under the rug. School took no follow-up action for the student, Mr Chang Wai San did not apologise, the HOD asked the female student to change class, female student did not change class, they continued to have him as the Chinese MTL teacher for another 1 year.
As a student, can confirm people like my seniors sec 3-4 like to beat each others buttocks, but then the food is still reasonably priced, the chicken rice stall is cheap and taste good

Was a student there in 2012, im a buddhist and i was forced to go in church and sit through the whole church timing. Being brainwashed how "God" is great and how "God" is the only one who would put u in heaven. Very bad school. I saw muslims given the rights to stay in a room during chapel time but i was being DENIED when I ask to opt out, they said I was being rude and disrespectful, from then on, a few christian teachers judged me and treated me badly in school.
